episode_summary: This episode covers a range of fascinating topics including the potential for humans to sense magnetic fields, military tanks that carry fold-out bridges, a mysterious banned game in Oregon, and the unique sneeze-based voting system of African wild dogs.

facts.fact: Humans should be able to sense magnetic fields.
The army has tanks that carry fold-out bridges for when they meet a river that they can't cross.
A new law in Oregon has banned the game called Big Engine, and there is no evidence anyone has played Big Engine since the 1950s and no living person appears to know the rules.
African wild dogs have a sneeze-based voting system.
